transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan Nadeem sir good morning.
Customer: Ji morning batao. 
Executive: Haan Imran baat kar raha tha sir India Mart se kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Main theek hun main theek hun batao aap kaise hai? 
Executive: Haan main keh raha tha sir ki badhiya sir thank you. Main keh raha tha sir ki aapne jo kal concern bataya tha na maine to escalate kiya hai sir but abhi kuch update aaya nahi hai sir. 
Customer: To wo to uske liye nahi aaya to wo to aapko karna padega na pehle resolve karo then uske baad mujhe call karo na aap. 
Executive: Haan main bilkul maine mera call karne ka jo purpose tha na sir ye tha ki already maine isko escalate kiya hua hai theek hai sir aur aap mera number ye save kar sakte hai sir jaisa bhi update aayega na sir already main aapko khud hi samne se call karke update kar dunga sir. 
Customer: Haan to abhi phone karne ka koi matlab hi nahi raha na jaise hi kuch update aaya aap then mujhe phone kijiyega. 
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. 
Customer: Aur kya hota hai na. 
Executive: Main aapko keh raha hun. 
Executive: Haan kya hota hai na sir ki jaise aap log ek mail karte ho na to hamare paas ek concern open ho jata hai sir. 
Customer: To wo to concern aap clear nahi kar pa rahe to tab tak to main kaise close karaunga batao. 
Executive: Nahi main clear ka nahi keh raha hun sir permission ke liye pucha sir aapse ki already maine escalate kiya hua hai sir. 
Customer: Uspe work karo aap pehle uspe work karo kyunki kaafi time ho gaya ek mahine se ya do mahine se jyada ho gaye maine pehle bhi escalation kara tha mere haan se but uske baad bhi aap logon ne us par koi kaam nahi kara to jo aapne kaam nahi kara uska to mere se to banta hi hai raise karna to to jo maine cheeze raise kari hai usko wo to valuable hai ab close kab hogi wo jab aap uspe hai na kaam karoge kaam abhi aapka hua hi nahi. 
Executive: Nahi nahi kaam karke. 
Customer: Aapne kitne efforts mare aapne kitne efforts mare wo kuch nahi dekha jata aapne kaam karke diya wo efforts consider hota hai aapko pata hai sir iska funda. 
Executive: Nadeem sir main bilkul aapka samajh gaya baat sir dekhiye sir aapne file consume kiya sir. 
Customer: Dekho ek cheez batau main to dekho beuda baat nahi hoti sachchi mein batau aapko agar aap hai na valuable baat karo to main baat karu aapse please. 
Executive: Nahi nahi theek hai koi issue nahi koi issue nahi hai. 
Executive: Maine bas ek permission ke liye aapko call kiya tha agar aapko lagta hai nahi ki proper update aane ke baad main aapko update karu to koi issue nahi sir jaisa bhi update aayega main aapko samne se call karke aur file ke bare mein bata dunga ki sir mere file team ne sir ye update diya hai sir aap aakar bataiye jaise aapka decision hoga fir aap bata dijiyega uske according hai na sir. 
Customer: Chaliye theek hai koi koi issue nahi Nadeem sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's issue is not yet resolved.

- Wants resolution before executive calls.



Resolution:

- Executive has escalated the issue.

- Executive asked for permission to call after update.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after receiving an update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- escalation, update, resolution, permission
